attributes.action: Teach all police officer's about epileptic seizures so no more innocent people end up in cells.
attributes.additional_details: All police officer's should be taught about epilepsy and how to recognise it and help someone having a seizure so that no more innocent people end up in cells for being "drunk & disorderly" or on suspicion of using drugs. Some people have died under such circumstances because they did not receive the medical assistance required.
